oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Don Schlitz - 2017-04-29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Don Schlitz from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 29, 2017.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Don Schlitz;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (04:01) Opening comments from Michael Gray and Don Schlitz / 06:18) Introduction of Don Schlitz / (08:35) Opening comments from Don / (08:44) Performs You're My Favorite / (11:22) Performs One Promise Too Late / (13:55) Performs 40 Hour Week / (17:03) Talks about co-writers Lisa Silver and Dave Loggins / (17:42) Performs The Greatest / (20:48) Talks about The Greatest and Kenny Rogers / (24:07) Performs The Gambler / (29:30) Don talks about self-esteem / (31:22) Mentions co-writer Johnny Thompson / (31:30) Performs Allergic To Crazy / (33:48) Talks about Bluebird Cafe / (35:27) Performs On The Other Hand / (37:24) Performs Deeper Than the Holler (excerpt) / (38:53) Talks about his wife Stacey and audio CD's that he has for sale / (40:36) Performs When You Say Nothing At All / (43:39) Performs Forever and Ever, Amen / (49:38) Program applause / (49:58) Walk-out music / (51:35) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Schlitz, Don; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
